title: Gates Cambridge Scholarship 2026-27
eligibility_text: Outstanding non-UK applicants for postgraduate study at Cambridge demonstrating intellectual ability and leadership potential.

eligibility_text: Outstanding applicants from Chevening-eligible countries for one-year Masters study in UK with 2+ years work experience.
description: Fully funded one-year Masters degree at UK universities with full living allowance and travel costs.

description: 640 general scholarships for study in India with full tuition and living allowance.

eligibility_text: Indian citizens enrolled in 1st year undergraduate program with family income less than INR 15 lakhs.
description: 5,000 merit-cum-means scholarships for underprivileged students with mentoring and career support.

description: Comprehensive platform covering central and state government scholarships for disadvantaged communities.

eligibility_text: Women who are not U.S. citizens or permanent residents pursuing full-time graduate or postdoctoral study in the United States.

eligibility_text: Students from minority communities (Muslims, Christians, Sikhs, Buddhists, Jains, Parsis) pursuing higher education in India.
description: Government scholarship covering tuition fees and maintenance allowances for minority students.

title: Pre Matric Scholarship For Students With Disabilities
eligibility_text: Students with disabilities (40%+ disability) pursuing pre-matric education in India.
provider: Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities
description: Government scholarship supporting students with disabilities in pre-matric education.
academic_score: Regular attendance required / Pass marks or 2.0+ GPA or 5/10

title: Azim Premji Scholarship
eligibility_text: Students from economically disadvantaged backgrounds pursuing undergraduate programs in India.
description: Comprehensive scholarship with mentoring for economically disadvantaged students.

title: HDFC Bank Parivartan ECSS Programme 2025-26
eligibility_text: Students from economically weaker sections with demonstrated academic merit and commitment to education.
description: Supporting students from economically weaker sections through educational scholarships and comprehensive support services.

title: Daughters for Life Scholarship 2025-26
eligibility_text: Girls from conflict-affected regions with demonstrated academic merit and commitment to education.
description: Supporting girls from conflict-affected regions through educational scholarships and comprehensive support services.

title: KC Mahindra Trust Scholarship 2025-26
eligibility_text: Meritorious students pursuing higher education abroad with demonstrated academic merit and commitment to education.
description: Supporting meritorious students pursuing higher education abroad through educational scholarships and comprehensive support services.

title: Various Scholarships

description: Supporting economically disadvantaged students through educational scholarships and comprehensive support services.
